data.title: Review of iHeartRadio 93.3 FLZ’s Jingle Ball 2016 annual holiday concert at AMALIE® Arena featuring Pitbull, The Chainsmokers, Fifth Harmony, DNCE, Lukas Graham, Martin Garrix and Daya
data.meta_description: Correspondent: CarolAnn Popovich   www.CarolAnnPopovich.com Photographers: Aric Popovich, Red Carpet; Karen Wain, Stage Editor: Don of Don411.com For the fourth consecutive year, Tampa Bay iHeartRa…
data.meta_site_name: Don411.com Media :: Performing Arts News Unabridged
data.text:
Correspondent: CarolAnn Popovich www.CarolAnnPopovich.com

Photographers: Aric Popovich, Red Carpet; Karen Wain, Stage

Editor: Don of Don411.com

For the fourth consecutive year, Tampa Bay iHeartRadio 93.3 FLZ’s Jingle Ball 2016 annual holiday concert at AMALIE® Arena, presented by Capital One, was a star-studded, two-thumbs-up success. Saturday, December 17, this year’s tourism ambassador and headliner Pitbull was joined by a few of the biggest and somewhat newer names in the pop-music and EDM industry including The Chainsmokers, Fifth Harmony, DNCE, Lukas Graham, Martin Garrix and Daya.

Kane & Scotty Davis, 93.3 FLZ’s on-air personalities, announced the first group for the evening: The Chainsmokers. The country’s hottest pop duo, Andrew Taggart and Alex Pall, were first to take center stage promptly at 7:00 PM. The crowded arena jumped to their feet as they opened with ‘Roses’ and never sat down as the went into their newer music to include their three Top 10 singles of this year. Daya, an 18 years old Pittsburgh native who released her debut album earlier this year, “Sit Still Look Pretty,” took the stage with The Chainsmokers for their closing number. Together they performed their Grammy nominated ‘Don’t Let Me Down.’ When asked about her collaborations with The Chainsmokers, “Everything they produce turns to gold…I would do it again.” Daya’s performance was clearly a crowd-pleaser. As she performed her pop-music hits, it was evident this recent high school graduate had made her way past up-and-coming performer.

Jon Bellion, a hip-hop and rock singer-songwriter who also released his first album this year and recently won a Grammy at the 57th annual Grammy Awards, took the stage following Daya. Immediately following Bellion was the fairly new pop-rock band, DNCE. Every song was a home run with the fans. The crowd was on their feet as the lead singer Joe Jonas, formerly a part of the Jonas Brothers, along with drummer Jack Lawless, guitarist JinJoo and bassist Cole Whittle, sang songs such as the Billboard’s Top 100 #9 on hit song “Cake by the Ocean.” Their reply when asked what was best about 2016: “Winning a best new artist VMA and the celebration afterward.” The group also expressed their eagerness to continue touring and making new music in 2017.

Following DNCE, was another pop-rock group, Lukas Graham. This Danish group, who released their first album in 2012, performed a more soulful set. Their performance was strong, and it was evident they intended to convince their fans that they were well on their way to becoming much more than a small Danish band with one very recognizable hit. When asked about his great 2016 moments, frontman Lukas Forchhammer expressed “becoming a father and receiving a Grammy nomination” for their piano ballad hit song ‘7 years’ which peaked at #2 on Billboard’s Top 100.

Fifth Harmony’s electrifying energy filled the stage and the arena. The group of 5 ladies, who originally came together in 2012 as the result of the X Factor show, have won 3 VMAs and 7 Teen Choice Awards. Immediately following Fifth Harmony was the #1 EDM DJ in the world Martin Garrix. This 20-year old from Amsterdam is the youngest ever to receive the award. Earlier that evening when asked about such accolades and accomplishments that include releasing his first song, ‘Animals,’ at the age of 15, starting his record label in 2016, and closing day one Ultra Main Stage in March of 2016, Garrix replied:

“It’s weird, it’s a dream come true.

“Five years ago, I was a visitor in the crowd at Ultra and heard someone play one of my songs during their set. It was amazing. I love Ultra. I first performed there 4 years ago.”

“To me, I am on the list of all the people I look up to. I started making music and DJing because of Tiesto; so, being presented with the #1 EDM DJ in the world award from him was unbelievable.”

Martin Garrix’s performance did not disappoint and left the crowd eager for Pitbull. The Miamian took the stage in true get-the-party-started fashion. For over 20 minutes, AMALIE® Arena was tranformed into like a happening Latin club as Florida’s biggest pop ambassador performed and closed out the night with his popular hip-hop music.

Jingle Ball 2016 Facts and Take Aways

The Chainsmokers:

Opened with Roses

Closed with Don’t Let Me Down with Daya

Jingle Ball was first of 3 shows that night; also performed in Orlando and DR

Closer was the first #1 single, first debuted at Sunset Music Festival in Tampa

Formed together in 2014; First performance as group was at Sunset Music Festival in 2014

http://www.thechainsmokers.com/

Daya

18 years old; born in Pittsburgh

Hit song, Hide away, reached #23 on Billboard’s Top 100

Graduated high school in June

Daya means compassion or kindness

Grammy nomination with the Chainsmokers

Interview:

Released first album was best part of 2016

Loved working with the chainsmokers, “Everything they produce turns to gold”, would do it again

http://www.theofficialdaya.com/

Jon Bellion

born in Long Island, New York

Released his first album this year

http://www.jonbellion.com/

DNCE

Funk pop, dance rock band, started in 2015

Leading singer is Joe Jonas, who used to be part of Jonas Brothers

Nominated for Favorite New Artist in 2016

Hit song “Cake by the Ocean” reached #9 on Billboard’s Top 100

Interview:

Best moment of 2016; winning a “best new artist” VMA and celebrating afterwards

Most excited for touring and making new music in 2017

http://www.dnce.com/

Lukas Graham

Danish pop and soul band

Hit song “7 years” peaked at #2 on Billboard’s Top 100

First album released in 2012 was #1 on Danish charts

Interview:

Best part of 2016 was becoming a father, and receiving a Grammy nomination

http://www.lukasgraham.com

Fifth Harmony

Group of 5 girls that came together in 2012 from the show X Factor

One of them, Camila Cabello, announced the day after Jingle Ball that she is leaving the group

Have won 3 VMAs and 7 Teen Choice Awards

https://fifthharmony.com/727/

Martin Garrix

20 years old, from Amsterdam

Voted #1 DJ in the world, youngest ever to receive the award

Founded his own record label in 2016

Released his first ever song, Animals, at the age of 15

Interview:

On being ranked #1; “Its weird, it’s a dream come true. To me, I am in the list of all the people I look up to. I started making music and DJing because of Tiesto so being presented with that award from him was unbelievable.”

On closing day one Ultra Main Stage in March 2016; “I love Ultra, I first performed there 4 years ago. I was a visitor 5 years ago and heard someone play one of my songs, while I was in the crowd, during their set. It was amazing.

On plans after Jingle Ball; “Going back home in Amsterdam to spend Christmas with my parents and do more studio work.”

http://www.martingarrix.com/

Pitbull

35 years old, from Miami

Released his first album in 2004

His first #1 hit was “Give Me Everything” in 2011

His second #1 hit was Timber with Ke$ha

Icon for Florida; “Mr. 305”

https://www.pitbullmusic.com/

##

[Press Release: EVENT RECAP: Pitbull and Martin Garrix Join the iHeartRadio Jingle Ball Tour for Tampa’s 93.3 FLZ’s Jingle Ball]

Last night at 93.3 FLZ’s Jingle Ball 2016 Presented by Capital One at Amalie Arena, the stars were out in full force on the eleventh stop of the national iHeartRadio Jingle Ball Tour 2016 Presented by Capital One. The event featured iconic and emerging performers including: Pitbull, The Chainsmokers, Fifth Harmony, DNCE, Lukas Graham, Martin Garrix and Daya.

Pitbull aka Mr. Worldwide made his iHeartRadio Jingle Ball tour debut, closing the show in his home state, performing hits “Don’t Stop The Party” and “I Know you Want Me” with a full band and dancers on stage. Martin Garrix joined the Jingle Ball line-up and had the crowd dancing to songs like “Runaway”. Fifth Harmony sported Tampa Bay Lightning jerseys and were in sync to each move while performing “Work from Home” ft. Ty Dolla $ign, “Worth It,” “That’s My Girl” and more. Fellow Jingle Ball artists, DNCE were singing and dancing side stage to the girl group after their electrifying performance earlier in the evening.

93.3 FLZ’s iHeartRadio Jingle Ball 2016 is the eleventh stop of the national iHeartRadio Jingle Ball Tour, the season’s biggest annual music event that captures the holiday spirit of the iHeartRadio app, in Dallas, San Francisco/San Jose, Los Angeles, Minneapolis, Philadelphia, New York, Boston, Washington DC, Chicago, Atlanta, Tampa and Miami. The concert also donated $1.00 of each ticket sold to the Ryan Seacrest Foundation – a non-profit organization, which is dedicated to inspiring today’s youth through entertainment and education focused initiatives.

The iHeartRadio Jingle Ball 2016 Tour is presented by Capital One. Additional proud partners of this year’s national iHeartRadio Jingle Ball Tour event(s) include: Allstate Insurance Company, Macy’s, The CW Network, Ulta, Mondelez and Verizon.

93.3 FLZ Jingle Ball 2016 is also sponsored locally by CW44.

17, 2016 in Tampa, FL

About iHeartMedia Tampa Bay:

iHeartMedia Tampa Bay owns and operates 93.3 WFLZ FM, WFLZ HD, WBTP FM, WXTB FM, WMTX FM, WFUS FM, WMTX HD, WDAE AM, WFLA AM and WHNZ AM and is part of iHeartMedia. With over a quarter of a billion monthly listeners in the U.S. and over 85 million social followers, iHeartMedia has the largest national reach of any radio or television outlet in America. As the leader in multiplatform connections, it also serves over 150 local markets through 858 owned radio stations, and the company’s radio stations and content can be heard on AM/FM, HD digital radio, satellite radio, on the Internet at iHeartRadio.com and on the company’s radio station websites, on the iHeartRadio mobile app, in enhanced auto dashes, on tablets, wearables and smartphones, and on gaming consoles.

iHeartRadio, iHeartMedia’s digital radio platform, is the fastest growing digital audio service in the U.S. and offers users thousands of live radio stations, personalized custom artist stations created by just one song or seed artist and the top podcasts and personalities. With over a billion downloads, iHeartRadio reached 90 million registered users faster than any other radio or digital music service and even faster than Facebook.

iHeartMedia’s platforms include radio broadcasting, online, mobile, digital and social media, podcasts, personalities and influencers, live concerts and events, syndication, music research services and independent media representation. iHeartMedia is a division of iHeartMedia, Inc. (OTCBB: IHRT). Visit iHeartMedia.com for more company information.

About Capital One

Capital One Financial Corporation (www.capitalone.com) is a financial holding company whose subsidiaries, which include Capital One, N.A., and Capital One Bank (USA), N.A., had $221.1 billion in deposits and $339.1 billion in total assets as of June 30, 2016. Headquartered in McLean, Virginia, Capital One offers a broad spectrum of financial products and services to consumers, small businesses and commercial clients through a variety of channels. Capital One, N.A. has branches located primarily in New York, Louisiana, Texas, Maryland, Virginia, New Jersey and the District of Columbia. A Fortune 500 company, Capital One trades on the New York Stock Exchange under the symbol “COF” and is included in the S&P 100 index.

About The Ryan Seacrest Foundation:

The Ryan Seacrest Foundation (RSF) is a non-profit 501(c)(3) dedicated to inspiring today’s youth through entertainment and education-focused initiatives. RSF’s first initiative is to build broadcast media centers — Seacrest Studios — within pediatric hospitals for patients to explore the creative realms of radio, television and new media. Founded in 2009, RSF currently has Seacrest Studios at hospitals in Atlanta, Boston, Charlotte, Cincinnati, Dallas, Denver, Nashville, Orange County, Philadelphia and Washington D.C. For more information, visit www.ryanseacrestfoundation.org.

###

[Press Release, Amalie Arena]

93.3 FLZ’S JINGLE BALL 2016, PRESENTED BY CAPITAL ONE,

RINGS IN THE SEASON WITH ANNUAL STAR-STUDDED HOLIDAY CONCERT

Top Recording Artists, Pitbull, The Chainsmokers and Fifth Harmony Lead All-Star Lineup

Celebration to Benefit The Ryan Seacrest Foundation

SATURDAY, DECEMBER 17 AT AMALIE ARENA

Tickets go on sale Monday, October 17 at 12:00 PM

TAMPA, FL – 93.3 FLZ, Tampa Bay’s Hit Music Station, today unveiled the star-studded lineup for its annual holiday concert, 93.3 FLZ’s Jingle Ball 2016, presented by Capital One, taking place on Saturday, December 17 at 7:00 PM at AMALIE® Arena. 93.3 FLZ’s Jingle Ball 2016 is part of the national iHeartRadio Jingle Ball Tour, the season’s biggest annual music event that captures the holiday spirit of the iHeartRadio app, in Dallas; San Francisco/San Jose; Los Angeles; Minneapolis; Philadelphia; New York; Boston; Washington, D.C.; Chicago; Atlanta; Tampa and Miami/Ft. Lauderdale. Tickets go on sale Monday, October 17 at 12:00 PM.

93.3 FLZ’s on-air personalities, Kane & Scotty Davis, officially announced the all-star performers for 93.3 FLZ’s Jingle Ball 2016 which will include: Pitbull, The Chainsmokers, Fifth Harmony, DNCE, Lukas Graham, Martin Garrix and Daya.

Capital One will sponsor the iHeartRadio Jingle Ball tour and as part of this partnership, Capital One cardholders get exclusive first access to high demand tickets through a special iHeartRadio Jingle Ball Capital One Cardholder Pre-Sale. The iHeartRadio Jingle Ball Capital One Cardholder Pre-Sale will begin October 13 at 10:00 AM local and will run through October 16 at 10:00 AM local or while supplies last. Tickets will be available at www.iHeartRadio.com/CapitalOne. Any remaining tickets will go on sale to the general public on Monday, October 17 at 12:00 PM local market time, and will be available at www.iHeartRadio.com/JingleBall.

“93.3 FLZ’s Jingle Ball is the most anticipated concert event of the year in Tampa Bay,” said John Mayer, 93.3 FLZ’s Program Director. “We are excited to bring together the biggest names in pop music to celebrate another awesome year!”

“Jingle Ball is one of my favorite events of the year,” said Kane, 93.3 FLZ’s Morning Show Host. “When we get the hottest acts in music together with a few thousand fans and a little holiday magic, anything can happen!”

Every year, 93.3 FLZ’s Jingle Ball gives back to the community to celebrate the holiday season. This year’s official charity for 93.3 FLZ’s Jingle Ball 2016 is the Ryan Seacrest Foundation – $1.00 of each ticket sold will be donated to the non-profit organization, which is dedicated to inspiring today’s youth through entertainment and education focused initiatives.

“The Ryan Seacrest Foundation is honored to team up with the iHeartRadio Jingle Ball Tour for its fourth consecutive year, allowing us to continue to support the children’s hospitals we partner with across the country,” said Meredith Seacrest, Executive Director & COO of the Ryan Seacrest Foundation. “We are thankful to iHeartMedia for helping our foundation create an uplifting environment and positive distraction for patients and their families through our Seacrest Studios and its programming.”

The iHeartRadio Jingle Ball 2016 Tour is presented by Capital One. Additional proud partners of this year’s national iHeartRadio Jingle Ball Tour event(s) include: Allstate Insurance Company, Macy’s, Mondelez International, the maker of OREO, RITZ, TRIDENT and SOUR PATCH KIDS, The CW Network, and Verizon. Multimarket partners include: Ulta Beauty. 93.3 FLZ’s Jingle Ball 2016 is also sponsored locally by CW44.

For up-to-minute information on 93.3 FLZ’s Jingle Ball 2016, log on to www.933FLZ.com keyword: Jingle Ball or listen to 93.3 FLZ on-air or online via the station’s website, as well as on iHeartRadio.com and the iHeartRadio mobile app, iHeartMedia’s all-in-one music streaming and digital radio service.

93.3 FLZ is a leading media outlet in the Tampa market and its programming and content are available across multiple platforms, including its broadcast stations; online via its branded digital sites; mobile; and social, with nationwide listening through iHeartRadio — with more than a billion downloads, more than 85 million social media followers and 90 million registered users.

About iHeartMedia Tampa Bay:

iHeartMedia Tampa Bay owns and operates 93.3WFLZ FM, WFLZ HD, WBTP FM, WXTB FM, WMTX FM, WFUS FM, WMTX HD, WDAE AM, WFLA AM and WHNZ AM and is part of iHeartMedia. With over a quarter of a billion monthly listeners in the U.S. and over 85 million social followers, iHeartMedia has the largest national reach of any radio or television outlet in America. As the leader in multiplatform connections, it also serves over 150 local markets through 858 owned radio stations, and the company’s radio stations and content can be heard on AM/FM, HD digital radio, satellite radio, on the Internet at iHeartRadio.com and on the company’s radio station websites, on the iHeartRadio mobile app, in enhanced auto dashes, on tablets, wearables and smartphones, and on gaming consoles.

iHeartRadio, iHeartMedia’s digital radio platform, is the fastest growing digital audio service in the U.S. and offers users thousands of live radio stations, personalized custom artist stations created by just one song or seed artist and the top podcasts and personalities. With over a billion downloads, iHeartRadio reached 90 million registered users faster than any other radio or digital music service and even faster than Facebook.

iHeartMedia’s platforms include radio broadcasting, online, mobile, digital and social media, podcasts, personalities and influencers, live concerts and events, syndication, music research services and independent media representation. iHeartMedia is a division of iHeartMedia, Inc. (OTCBB: IHRT). Visit iHeartMedia.com for more company information.

About Capital One

Capital One Financial Corporation (www.capitalone.com) is a financial holding company whose subsidiaries, which include Capital One, N.A., and Capital One Bank (USA), N.A., had $221.1 billion in deposits and $339.1 billion in total assets as of June 30, 2016. Headquartered in McLean, Virginia, Capital One offers a broad spectrum of financial products and services to consumers, small businesses and commercial clients through a variety of channels. Capital One, N.A. has branches located primarily in New York, Louisiana, Texas, Maryland, Virginia, New Jersey and the District of Columbia. A Fortune 500 company, Capital One trades on the New York Stock Exchange under the symbol “COF” and is included in the S&P 100 index.

The Ryan Seacrest Foundation (RSF) is a non-profit 501(c)(3) dedicated to inspiring today’s youth through entertainment and education-focused initiatives. RSF’s first initiative is to build broadcast media centers — Seacrest Studios— within pediatric hospitals for patients to explore the creative realms of radio, television and new media. Founded in 2009, RSF currently has Seacrest Studios at hospitals in Atlanta, Boston, Charlotte, Cincinnati, Dallas, Denver, Nashville, Orange County, Philadelphia and Washington D.C. ###

TICKETS: Tickets for the event go on sale Monday, October 17 at 12:00 PM at the McDonald’s® Ticket Office at AMALIE Arena, Ticketmaster outlets and at Ticketmaster.com. Order tickets by phone by calling 800.745.3000. Ticket prices are $20.00, $40.00, $55.00, $75.00, $99.00 and $150.00. Prices do not include facility fee or service charges or $1.00 donation to the Ryan Seacrest Foundation. Group discounts available by calling 813.301.6900. Advanced parking passes are available at Ticketmaster.com or the ticket office. Visit amaliearena.com or call 813.301.2500 for more information.

— AMALIEArena.com –

Tampa Bay Sports & Entertainment – Amalie Arena | Tampa Bay Lightning | Tampa Bay Storm

401 Channelside Drive, Tampa, FL 33602

McDonald’s Ticket Office – 813.301.2500 – Hours: Mon-Fri 9am-5pm, Sat 9am-2pm

Tampa Bay Sports & Entertainment – Amalie Arena | Tampa Bay Lightning | Tampa Bay Storm

[Press Release, National Tour]

iHeartMedia Rings In The Holiday Season With The Return Of Its Iconic 2016 National “iHeartRadio Jingle Ball Tour Presented by Capital One”

iHeartRadio Brings Bruno Mars, Justin Bieber, Britney Spears, Niall Horan and Other Top Recording Artists To Lead All-Star Lineups in Major Cities Across the U.S. Including New York, Los Angeles, Miami, Chicago and Dallas

The “iHeartRadio Jingle Ball Tour Presented by Capital One” will live stream exclusively on CWTV.com and The CW App and Broadcast on December 15 as an exclusive nationwide 90-minute broadcast special on The CW Network

New York, N.Y. – October 11, 2016 – iHeartMedia will celebrate the holiday season across the nation with its annual “iHeartRadio Jingle Ball Tour Presented by Capital One” – the season’s spectacular music event, which captures the music and holiday spirit of the iHeartRadio app with performances by this year’s biggest recording artists. The iHeartRadio Jingle Ball 2016 Tour Presented by Capital One will stop in Dallas; San Francisco; Los Angeles; Minneapolis; Philadelphia; New York; Boston; Washington, D.C.; Chicago; Atlanta; Tampa and Miami.

“The iHeartRadio Jingle Ball Tour has become synonymous with the holidays,” said Tom Poleman, President of National Programming Group, iHeartMedia. “Fans wait all year to hear who will be playing this tour, and we’re thrilled to be announcing an impressive lineup. If you’re an artist who makes it to this stage, it means you’re one of the most important artists in pop music this year.”

Each year, iHeartMedia stations across the country host Jingle Ball concerts in local cities that feature performances by the year’s most iconic recording artists as well as emerging talent. Z100’s Jingle Ball in New York on Friday, December 9th will be carried live on over 100 iHeartRadio CHR stations and as a live video stream on CWTV.com and within the CW app beginning at 8:30pm ET across all time zones. The event will also be featured as an exclusive nationwide 90-minute broadcast television special on The CW Network on Thursday, December 15, at 8 p.m. EST/PST.

“What started as a local holiday concert in New York over twenty years ago, has become a nationwide holiday music tour, a radio broadcast and CW Network telecast that reaches millions of music fans.” Said John Sykes, President of Entertainment Enterprises at iHeartMedia.

For the second straight year, Capital One will be the national title sponsor for the iHeartRadio Jingle Ball Tour. As part of this sponsorship, Capital One cardholders will be the first to get exclusive access to high demand tickets through a special iHeartRadio Jingle Ball Capital One Cardholder Pre-Sale in each city.

The iHeartRadio Jingle Ball Capital One Cardholder Pre-Sale begins October 13 at 10 a.m. local market time and runs through October 16 at 10 a.m. local market time or while supplies last. Tickets will be available at www.iHeartRadio.com/CapitalOne.

All other tickets go on sale to the general public on October 17 at 12 p.m. local market time, and will be available at www.iHeartRadio.com/JingleBall

In addition to the Capital One Cardholder pre-sale, at each of the tour stops, one lucky Capital One cardholder will have the exclusive opportunity to announce an artist on stage. To learn more visit www.iHeartRadio.com/CapitalOne beginning in November for more details.

The 2016 Jingle Ball Schedule Includes:

Dallas, Texas – Tuesday, November 29 at 7:30 p.m. CST – 106.1 KISS FM’s Jingle Ball 2016 Presented by Capital One at American Airlines Center

The star studded lineup features: Meghan Trainor, The Chainsmokers, Fifth Harmony, Backstreet Boys, Alessia Cara, Charlie Puth, Daya, Lukas Graham and Hailee Steinfeld.

Ticket information available via 1061kissfm.iheart.com

San Francisco/The Bay Area – Thursday, December 1, at 7:30 p.m. PST – WiLD 94.9’s FM’s Jingle Ball 2016 Presented by Capital One at SAP Center, San Jose

The star studded lineup features: Shawn Mendes, The Chainsmokers, Charlie Puth, Diplo, Tove Lo, Alessia Cara, Lukas Graham and Daya, plus a Special Guest appearance from Niall Horan.

Ticket information available via wild949.iheart.com

Los Angeles, Ca. – Friday, December 2, at 7:30 p.m. PST – KIIS FM’s Jingle Ball 2016 Presented by Capital One at STAPLES Center

The star studded lineup features: Bruno Mars, Justin Bieber, Britney Spears, Meghan Trainor, Fifth Harmony, Diplo, Alessia Cara, Lukas Graham and Daya, plus a Special Guest appearance from Niall Horan.

Ticket information available via kiisfm.iheart.com

Minneapolis, Minn. – Monday, December 5, at 7:30 p.m. CST – KDWB’s Jingle Ball 2016 Presented by Capital One at Xcel Energy Center, St. Paul

The star studded lineup features: Fifth Harmony, G-Eazy, Diplo, Backstreet Boys, Lukas Graham, Alessia Cara, Tove Lo, Hailee Steinfeld and Gnash.

Ticket information available via kdwb.iheart.com

Philadelphia, Pa. – Wednesday, December 7, at 7:30 p.m. EST – Q102’s Jingle Ball 2016 Presented by Capital One at Wells Fargo Center

The star studded lineup features: Shawn Mendes, Fifth Harmony, Diplo, Ellie Goulding, DNCE, Charlie Puth, Tove Lo, Alessia Cara and Lukas Graham.

Ticket information available via q102.iheart.com

New York, N.Y. – Friday, December 9, at 7:30 p.m. EST– Z100’s Jingle Ball 2016 Presented by Capital One at Madison Square Garden

The star studded lineup features: Justin Bieber, Ariana Grande, The Chainsmokers, Meghan Trainor, Fifth Harmony, Ellie Goulding, Diplo, Charlie Puth, Lukas Graham and Daya, plus a Special Guest appearance from Niall Horan.

Ticket information available via Z100.iheart.com

Z100’s Jingle Ball 2016 will video stream exclusively live on CWTV.com and The CW App and will air as a 90-minute special on The CW Network on December 15, at 8 p.m. EST/PST

Boston, Mass. – Sunday, December 11, at 6 p.m. EST – KISS 108’s Jingle Ball 2016 Presented by Capital One at TD Garden

The star-studded lineup features: Ariana Grande, Shawn Mendes, Diplo, Ellie Goulding, DNCE, Tove Lo, Alessia Cara and Daya, plus a Special Guest appearance from Niall Horan.

Ticket information available via kiss108.iheart.com

Washington, D.C. – Monday, December 12, at 7:30 p.m. EST – Hot 99.5’s Jingle Ball 2016 Presented by Capital One at Verizon Center

The star-studded lineup features: Meghan Trainor, The Chainsmokers, G-Eazy, Fifth Harmony, Diplo, Ellie Goulding, DNCE, Alessia Cara, Tove Lo and Daya, plus a Special Guest appearance from Niall Horan.

Ticket information available via hot995.iheart.com

Chicago, Ill. – Wednesday, December 14, at 7:30 p.m. CST – 103.5 KISS FM’s Jingle Ball 2016 Presented by Capital One at Allstate Arena

The star-studded lineup features: Ariana Grande, Ellie Goulding, Backstreet Boys, Tove Lo, Lukas Graham, Daya and Hailee Steinfeld, plus a Special Guest appearance from Niall Horan

Ticket information available via 1035KISSFM.iheart.com

Atlanta, Ga. – Friday, December 16, at 7:30 p.m. EST – Power 96.1’s Jingle Ball 2016 Presented by Capital One at Philips Arena

The star-studded lineup features: Ariana Grande, Meghan Trainor, The Chainsmokers, Fifth Harmony, DNCE, Alessia Cara, Daya and Lukas Graham.

Ticket information available at power961.iheart.com

Tampa Bay, Fla. – Saturday, December 17, at 7:00 p.m. EST – 93.3 FLZ’s Jingle Ball 2016 Presented by Capital One at Amalie Arena

The star-studded lineup features: Pitbull, The Chainsmokers, Fifth Harmony, DNCE, Lukas Graham, Martin Garrix and Daya.

Ticket information available via 933flz.iheart.com​

Miami, Fla. – Sunday, December 18, at 7:30 p.m. EST – Y100’s Jingle Ball 2016 Presented by Capital One at BB&T Center, Ft. Lauderdale

The star-studded lineup features: Diplo, Meghan Trainor, The Chainsmokers, Fifth Harmony, Nicky Jam, Alessia Cara, Charlie Puth, Tove Lo, Lukas Graham, and Hailee Steinfeld.

Ticket information available via y100.iheart.com

iHeartMedia and all of its broadcast radio stations are dedicated to inspiring and creating positive change that improves the lives of others. For the fourth consecutive year, 11 cities of the iHeartRadio Jingle Ball 2016 Tour Presented by Capital One, including San Francisco/San Jose; Los Angeles; Minneapolis; Philadelphia; New York; Boston; Washington, D.C.; Chicago; Atlanta; Tampa and Miami/Ft. Lauderdale will partner with The Ryan Seacrest Foundation, a non-profit organization dedicated to inspiring today’s youth through entertainment and education focused initiatives. In addition, 106.1 KISS FM’s Jingle Ball in Dallas will work with the Kidd’s Kids program of the Kraddick Foundation, which is dedicated to making a difference in the lives of children with special medical needs in the Dallas community. Each event will allocate a portion of ticket sales to its benefitting organization as well as offer exclusive packages to the nonprofits for both live and online auctions leading up to the events.

“The Ryan Seacrest Foundation is honored to team up with the iHeartRadio Jingle Ball Tour for its fourth consecutive year, allowing us to continue to support the children’s hospitals we partner with across the country,” said Meredith Seacrest, Executive Director & COO of the Ryan Seacrest Foundation. “We are thankful to iHeartMedia for helping our foundation create an uplifting environment and positive distraction for patients and their families through our Seacrest Studios and its programming.”

The iHeartRadio Jingle Ball 2016 Tour is presented by Capital One, additional proud partners of this year’s national iHeartRadio Jingle Ball Tour event(s) include: Allstate Insurance Company, Macy’s, Mondelez International, the maker of OREO, RITZ, TRIDENT and SOUR PATCH KIDS, The CW Network, and Verizon. Multimarket partners include: Ulta Beauty.

The iHeartRadio Jingle Ball Tour is produced by Tom Poleman, President of National Programming Platforms for iHeartMedia, John Sykes, President of Entertainment Enterprises for iHeartMedia and Darren Pfeffer, Senior Vice President of Music and Entertainment for iHeartMedia.

iHeartRadio.com is the No. 1 all-in-one digital audio service with over a billion downloads; it reached its first 20 million registered users faster than any digital service in Internet history and reached 90 million users faster than any other radio or digital music service and even faster than Facebook. In September, iHeartRadio announced that it is reinventing live radio with the launch of two new subscription services – iHeartRadio Plus and iHeartRadio All Access, which are both set to debut in January 2017.

Artists and/or events subject to change or cancellation without notice.

About Capital One

Capital One Financial Corporation (www.capitalone.com) is a financial holding company whose subsidiaries, which include Capital One, N.A., and Capital One Bank (USA), N.A., had $221.1 billion in deposits and $339.1 billion in total assets as of June 30, 2016. Headquartered in McLean, Virginia, Capital One offers a broad spectrum of financial products and services to consumers, small businesses and commercial clients through a variety of channels. Capital One, N.A. has branches located primarily in New York, Louisiana, Texas, Maryland, Virginia, New Jersey and the District of Columbia. A Fortune 500 company, Capital One trades on the New York Stock Exchange under the symbol “COF” and is included in the S&P 100 index.

About The Ryan Seacrest Foundation

The Ryan Seacrest Foundation (RSF) is a non-profit 501(c)(3) dedicated to inspiring today’s youth through entertainment and education-focused initiatives. RSF’s first initiative is to build broadcast media centers — Seacrest Studios — within pediatric hospitals for patients to explore the creative realms of radio, television and new media. Founded in 2009, RSF currently has Seacrest Studios at hospitals in Atlanta, Boston, Charlotte, Cincinnati, Dallas, Denver, Nashville, Orange County, Philadelphia and Washington D.C. For more information, visit www.ryanseacrestfoundation.org.

About iHeartMedia

With over a quarter of a billion monthly listeners in the U.S. and over 85 million social followers, iHeartMedia has the largest national reach of any radio or television outlet in America. As the leader in multiplatform connections, it also serves over 150 local markets through 858 owned radio stations, and the company’s radio stations and content can be heard on AM/FM, HD digital radio, satellite radio, on the Internet at iHeartRadio.com and on the company’s radio station websites, on the iHeartRadio mobile app, in enhanced auto dashes, on tablets, wearables and smartphones, and on gaming consoles.

iHeartRadio, iHeartMedia’s digital radio platform, is the fastest growing digital audio service in the U.S. and offers users thousands of live radio stations, personalized custom artist stations created by just one song or seed artist and the top podcasts and personalities. With over a billion downloads, iHeartRadio reached 90 million registered users faster than any other radio or digital music service and even faster than Facebook.

iHeartMedia’s platforms include radio broadcasting, online, mobile, digital and social media, podcasts, personalities and influencers, live concerts and events, syndication, music research services and independent media representation. iHeartMedia is a division of iHeartMedia, Inc. (OTCBB: IHRT). Visit iHeartMedia.com for more company information.​
